name: ManageContactSubscription
description:
Manage a contact's subscription preferences in Intercom.

Use this tool to add a subscription type to a contact in Intercom. You can opt the contact in or out based on the subscription type selected. It returns the updated subscription type for the contact.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to the contact by Intercom. This is required to specify which contact you want to manage the subscription for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact which is given by Intercom

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to be used. Options include versions from 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: subscription_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the subscription ID and consent type ('opt_in' or 'opt_out').

id.description: The unique identifier for the subscription which is given by Intercom

consent_type.description: The consent_type of a subscription, opt_out or opt_in.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact which is given by Intercom

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the contact which is given by Intercom

id.description: The unique identifier for the subscription which is given by Intercom

consent_type.description: The consent_type of a subscription, opt_out or opt_in.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
